attributes.action: Force Theresa May to step down in the interest of national security
attributes.additional_details:
We simply cannot have a prime minister who does everything they are told by the US. This happened with the invasion of Iraq, and will happen again if we don't take action now.

Theresa May, we the British people do not approve of military action in Syria. Your reckless behavior will end in catastrophe. You are picking on a world super-power, and we do not want war.
attributes.background: Theresa May has proven to be impulsive and careless when dealing with Russia. This petition is to force her to step down in the interests of national security.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise isn't the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.

The resignation of an MP, including the Prime Minister, would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
